      • freemarkerConfig

      • freemarkerBaseModel

        protected Map<String,Object> freemarkerBaseModel(RenderSupport renderSupport)

        Creates the request independant part of the freemarker model. The result is cached as unmodifiable map as it can safely be assumed that the render support does not change for a given portal.

        Parameters:
        renderSupport - the render support from the portal
        Returns:
        the result

      • freemarkerModel

        protected Map<String,Object> freemarkerModel(Map<String,Object> baseModel,

        Parameters:
